entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Aklavik
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:53 PM MST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -14.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Aklavik Airport 7:00 PM MST Thursday 09 March 2023
Temperature: -14.9°C
Pressure: 103.5 kPa
Humidity: 78 %
Wind Chill: -26
Dewpoint: -17.9°C
Wind: NW 32 km/h gust 52 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Blizzard. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Blizzard changing to snow and blowing snow late this evening and ending after midnight then clearing. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 after midnight. Low minus 20. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light late in the morning. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 25 in the evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 09 March 2023
